name: Neon Gensis: Magical Animals
description:
Warning:

The game may have performance problems in the HTML/web release. I'd recommend you play one of the desktop builds.

Description:

Move, shoot, and dash to wipe the floor clean.

Controls:

  • w, a, s, d to move
  • shift to be a speedy man
  • mouse to aim
  • left click to shoot
  • mouse wheel, q, e to cycle weapon
  • 1, 2, 3 to change to a weapon
  • escape to escape

Release Notes:

v0.1.1

Added shader caching so lag/hitching should be massively reduced

v0.1.0

Initial release
